description: Scene Three brings us back to the present to find Saxon nearly run over by a truck full of hunky hicks. The mountain men pull over up the road and the action moves to the truck's flatbed. Brad Hunt decides to teach the boys a lesson and throws chisled Josh Powell down and fucks his ass. Brad Erickson takes Powell's mouth, then he and Hunt change places. Powell services both horse-hung hillbillies like a pro. Erickson pumps a hot load all over Powell's bubble butt and all three collapse in a heap of cum and sweat.
title: The Road To Hopeful
